1: I live confident, sustained by guiding light and saving strength.
2: Protection prevails; safety and security endure.
3: I stay confident and calm through every challenge.
4: I live in sacred beauty and grow in understanding.
5: Protective refuge shelters and sets people high on solid rock.
6: I sing joyful praises with an uplifted heart.
7: I receive mercy and answers when I call out
8: I wholeheartedly seek the divine presence
9: Rely on steadfast presence and constant help.
10: Unshakable love receives every person into a welcoming home.
11: Teach me the right way and lead me on a clear path.
12: I remain protected; truth defends me and kindness surrounds me.
13: I believe I see goodness in the land of the living
14: I wait with courage and my heart strengthens
